alert.note: Alert for Okfuskee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 04 at 7:45PM CDT until May 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL OKFUSKEE COUNTY... At 745 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Okemah, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations in or near the path include... Okemah... Bearden... Castle... Clearview... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 212 and 225. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
